app_description: From classic titles to new streaming hits get Korean dramas movies K Pop variety shows and so much more with premium multi language subtitles on this app across the Americas. Explore the Extensive Library of Korean Dramas Movies and TV Shows Korean Dramas: Enjoy all time favorites Coffee Prince The Heirs Descendants of the Sun The Weightlifting Fairy Kim Bok Joo Hwarang and more titles with your favorite Korean actors. And do not miss on the most talked about Korean Dramas The Penthouse Weak Hero Class 1 My Dearest Young Lady and Gentleman and The Real Has Come! Korean Movies: Discover the most popular Korean movies like Along with the Gods Train to Busan The Wailing The Beauty Inside A Taxi Driver and more. Korean Variety Shows: Watch the fastest subtitled episodes of the biggest variety shows like Running Man Home Alone and The Manager plus variety shows starring K Pop artists like NCT Universe: LASTART EXO s Travel the World on a Ladder in Geoje Tongyeong aespa s Synk Road Holiday Staff: iKON s The DreamPing and so much more. K Pop: Indulge in special performances debut stage performances and comebacks from K Pop idols like BTS BLACKPINK Stray Kids SEVENTEEN Twice EXO and NCT on K Pop music programs and talk shows. KOCOWA Exclusives: AI incorporated search engine optimization that will help you find the exact content you re looking for Programming that s available just a few hours after airing in Korea An All Access Pass to over 25 0000 hours of Korean dramas movies variety shows documentaries K Pop shows and more Weekly real time LIVE streaming features for Running Man Classic episodes and K Pop performances The fastest premium multi language subtitles An endless collection of Korean dramas that you can download to watch anywhere anytime Start a 14 day free trial with any of the KOCOWA memberships and cancel at any time with no cancellation fees. Now sit back and enjoy while we invite you to the ultimate destination for Korean Entertainment. If you subscribe via iTunes: Payment will be charged to your iTunes Account after confirmation of purchase. Subscriptions automatically renew unless auto renew is turned off at least 24 hours before the end of the current period. An account will be charged for renewal within 24 hours prior to the end of the current period at the rate of your selected plan above. You can turn off auto renew at any time from your iTunes account settings.
